text:
The definitions of "Approve or Approval" and "City Project" shall be as set forth in Section 
79.2.
     "Proposed Project" shall mean any project within the scope of 
Chapter 79 and this Chapter where a City department, board, commission, or official makes any decision to potentially fund directly or administer the project through the use of federal, state, or other funding sources.
(Added by Ord. 43-12, File No. 111079, App. 3/13/12, Eff. 4/12/12)
